com.shipdream.lib.poke

Class ProviderFinderByRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shipdream.lib.poke.ProviderFinderByRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProviderFinder

    public class ProviderFinderByRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProviderFinder
    ProviderFinder that registers providers manually.

      • findProvider

        public <T> Provider<T> findProvider(java.lang.Class<T> type,
                           java.lang.annotation.Annotation qualifier)
                         throws ProviderMissingException
        Specified by:
        findProvider in interface ProviderFinder
        Throws:
        ProviderMissingException

      • register

        public <T> void register(java.lang.Class<T> type,
                java.lang.String implementationClassName)
              throws ProviderConflictException,
                     java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Register binding for type by full class name without scope cache. Qualifier of the class will be taken into account. Registering multiple bindings against the same type and qualifier will throw ProviderConflictException.
        Parameters:
        type - The type
        implementationClassName - The full name of the implementation class
        Throws:
        ProviderConflictException - Thrown when duplicate registries detected against the same type and qualifier.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the class the class name pointing to is not found.

      • register

        public <T> void register(java.lang.Class<T> type,
                java.lang.String implementationClassName,
                ScopeCache scopeCache)
              throws ProviderConflictException,
                     java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Register binding for type by full class name with given scope cache. Qualifier of the class will be taken into account. Registering multiple bindings against the same type and qualifier will throw ProviderConflictException.
        Parameters:
        type - The type
        implementationClassName - The full name of the implementation class
        scopeCache - The scope cache
        Throws:
        ProviderConflictException - Thrown when duplicate registries detected against the same type and qualifier.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the class the class name pointing to is not found.

      • register

        public <T> void register(java.lang.Class<T> type,
                java.lang.String implementationClassName,
                ScopeCache scopeCache,
                boolean allowOverride)
              throws ProviderConflictException,
                     java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Register binding for type by full class name without scope cache. Qualifier of the class will be taken into account. When allowOverride = false, it allows to register overriding binding against the same type and Qualifier and last wins, otherwise ProviderConflictException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        type - The type
        implementationClassName - The full name of the implementation class
        scopeCache - The scope cache
        allowOverride - Indicates whether allowing overriding registration
        Throws:
        ProviderConflictException - Thrown when duplicate registries detected against the same type and qualifier.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the class the class name pointing to is not found.

      • unregister

        public <T> void unregister(java.lang.Class<T> type,
                  java.lang.String implementationClassName)
                throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Unregister binding to the given type and the qualifier annotated to the given implementation class. If there is an overridden type registered already, only unregister the overridden binding. The original one will be unregistered if the this method is called again against to the type and qualifier associated with the provider.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the implementation to unregister
        implementationClassName - The name of the class annotated with the qualifier
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the class of the given class name is not found

      • register

        public <T,S extends T> void register(java.lang.Class<T> type,
                            java.lang.Class<S> implementationClass)
              throws ProviderConflictException
        Register binding for type by class type without scope cache. Qualifier of the class will be taken into account. Registering multiple bindings against the same type and qualifier will throw ProviderConflictException.
        Parameters:
        type - The type
        implementationClass - The class type of the implementation
        Throws:
        ProviderConflictException - Thrown when duplicate registries detected against the same type and qualifier.

      • register

        public <T,S extends T> void register(java.lang.Class<T> type,
                            java.lang.Class<S> implementationClass,
                            ScopeCache scopeCache)
              throws ProviderConflictException
        Register binding for type by class type with given scope cache. Qualifier of the class will be taken into account. Registering multiple bindings against the same type and qualifier will throw ProviderConflictException.
        Parameters:
        type - The type
        implementationClass - The class type of the implementation
        scopeCache - The scope cache
        Throws:
        ProviderConflictException - Thrown when duplicate registries detected against the same type and qualifier.

      • register

        public <T,S extends T> void register(java.lang.Class<T> type,
                            java.lang.Class<S> implementationClass,
                            ScopeCache scopeCache,
                            boolean allowOverride)
              throws ProviderConflictException
        Register binding for type by class type. Qualifier of the class will be taken into account. When allowOverride = false, it allows to register overriding binding against the same type and Qualifier and last wins, otherwise ProviderConflictException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        type - The type
        implementationClass - The class type of the implementation
        scopeCache - The scope cache
        allowOverride - Indicates whether allowing overriding registration
        Throws:
        ProviderConflictException - Thrown when duplicate registries detected against the same type and qualifier.

      • unregister

        public <T,S extends T> void unregister(java.lang.Class<T> type,
                              java.lang.Class<S> implementationClass)
        Unregister binding to the given type and the qualifier annotated to the given implementation class. If there is an overridden type registered already, only unregister the overridden binding. The original one will be unregistered if the this method is called again against to the type and qualifier associated with the provider.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the implementation to unregister
        implementationClass - The class annotated with the qualifier

      • register

        public void register(Provider provider)
              throws ProviderConflictException
        Register a Provider. Registering multiple bindings against the same type and qualifier will throw ProviderConflictException.
        Parameters:
        provider - The provider
        Throws:
        ProviderConflictException - Thrown when duplicate registries detected against the same type and qualifier.

      • register

        public void register(Provider provider,
            boolean allowOverride)
              throws ProviderConflictException
        Register a Provider. When allowOverride = false, it allows to register overriding binding against the same type and Qualifier and last wins, otherwise ProviderConflictException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        provider - The provider
        allowOverride - Indicates whether allowing overriding registration
        Throws:
        ProviderConflictException - Thrown when duplicate registries detected against the same type and qualifier.

      • unregister

        public void unregister(Provider provider)
        Unregister provider. If there is an overridden type registered already, only unregister the overridden binding. The original one will be unregistered if the this method is called again against to the type and qualifier associated with the provider.
        Parameters:
        provider - The provider that has the type and qualifier to unregister against

      • register

        public void register(Component component)
              throws ProvideException,
                     ProviderConflictException
        Register component where methods annotated by Provides will be registered as injection providers. Registering multiple bindings against the same type and qualifier will throw ProviderConflictException.
        Parameters:
        component - The components contains methods annotated by Provides
        Throws:
        ProvideException - Thrown when exception occurs during providers creating instances
        ProviderConflictException - Thrown when duplicate registries detected against the same type and qualifier.

      • register

        public void register(Component component,
            boolean allowOverride)
              throws ProvideException,
                     ProviderConflictException
        Register component where methods annotated by Provides will be registered as injection providers. When allowOverride = false, it allows to register overriding binding against the same type and Qualifier and last wins, otherwise ProviderConflictException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        component - The components contains methods annotated by Provides
        allowOverride - Indicates whether allowing overriding registration
        Throws:
        ProvideException - Thrown when exception occurs during providers creating instances
        ProviderConflictException - Thrown when duplicate registries detected against the same type and qualifier.

      • unregister

        public void unregister(Component component)
        Unregister component where methods annotated by Provides will be registered as injection providers.
        Parameters:
        component - The component contains methods annotated by Provides
